name: homework01-gtiko-1
description: * Create an Express web server that receives a `GET` request to `/lucas`. This route will receive a number passed in the request as query parameter as following: `http://localhost:3000/lucas?n=5` and returns a `JSON` object contains the Lucas number of `n`. Reference: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucas_number * Write a middleware to validate that the users are passing `n` as query parameter and the value is a valid `number`.
